version_description:
The ability to create shipments from Ukraine to the USA is added
The ability to delete shipments created “in one click” is added
Other minor fixes and improvements

Easier access to support contacts
Different fixes and improvements

Added the ability to create an international shipments from Ukraine to Canada
Added the ability to create shipments from Europe to Georgia
Added choice of Meest Agent offices and pick up method for creating international shipments from Ukraine
Added the ability to send international shipments from the offices of Nova Poshta
Expanded list of statuses for tracking shipments

- Added the ability to create shipments from Italy, France, Ukraine to Russia and from Turkey to Georgia
- Added the ability to create international shipments from Ukraine to Canada with courier delivery
- Added a new item “Tickets”
- Added push notifications for international shipments
- Added display of partner’s names for partner’s shipments
- Other fixes and improvements

We added:
- the ability to create international shipments from Ukraine to European countries
- insurance service for European myMeest shipments
- push notifications about changes of statuses of European packages and shipments
- automatic code filling with SMS
- push notifications for tickets
- quick search for tracking number when creating a ticket
- the ability to view tickets closed by the user
- selection of a carrier in the process of creating an package for tracking
- the status of the goods on the carrier’s website before receiving at the warehouse
- other fixes and improvements

Attention! Starting with this version of the application, support for iOS 11 is terminated. This means that in order to continue using the application, you need to update the system to a newer version of iOS.
Added the ability to create international shipments for guest login
Added the ability to select additional services for shipments from Europe
Added progress of statuses on the list of Shipments
Added terms and conditions for international shipments in the More menu - Terms and conditions
Improved the process of declaring goods in the package
Added display of international shipment return
Changed the index for the warehouse “Ukraine”
Other fixes and improvements

Changed the postal code of the warehouse in Portugal
The limit of free storage of packages in warehouses in Spain and Portugal has been canceled

Shopping assistance from Europe is added
Other minor fixes and improvements

MeestShopping is here!
See your orders and track your MeestCart deliveries.
More stability improvements

Added multi-currency for payments for delivery of shipments
Added shipping cost calculator
Added the ability to create international shipments from Ukraine to Moldova, Georgia and Asian countries (Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Russia)
Improved section “Tickets”
Other minor fixes and improvements

Added multi-currency for payments for delivery of shipments
Added shipping cost calculator
Added the ability to create international shipments from Ukraine to Moldova, Georgia and Asian countries (Kazakhstan, Uzbekistan, Russia)
Improved section “Tickets”
Other minor fixes and improvements
